section.heading: Town of Erwin urban renewal agency

content.p:
ยง 655. Town of Erwin urban renewal agency. An urban renewal agency, to
be known as the town of Erwin urban renewal agency, is hereby
established for the accomplishment of any or all of the purposes
specified in articles fifteen and fifteen-A of this chapter and in
accordance with article eighteen of the constitution of the state of New
York. It shall constitute a body corporate and politic, be perpetual in
duration and consist of five members who shall be the town board of the
town of Erwin. It shall have the powers and duties now or hereafter
conferred by article fifteen-A of this chapter upon municipal renewal
agencies. It shall be organized in the manner prescribed by and be
subject to the provisions of article fifteen-A of this chapter and the
agency, its members, officers and employees and its operations and
activities shall in all respects be governed by the provisions of such
article.
